name: PhoneSys
long_description: Formerly Pingm.
one_liner: The Phone System for Sales Teams.

name: Canopy Labs
long_description:
Every customer reaches a buying decision in their unique way – Canopy Labs helps businesses to track and optimize their customer journey.

Using our platform, businesses can plan more targeted marketing campaigns and optimize their lead lists, with a focus on maximizing revenue and sales growth. Our platform is currently being used in a variety of industries, including sports, ticket sales, daily deals, and online retail, and customers ranging from $10B retailers to small online businesses.

Canopy Labs has offices in Toronto and New York City. The company is led by CEO Wojciech Gryc, who is a former McKinsey consultant and Rhodes Scholar, and CTO Jorge Escobedo, who has a PhD in Theoretical Physics and researched string theory. It is backed by Y Combinator, BDC IT Ventures Fund, and Valar Ventures.
one_liner: Canopy Labs automates customer analytics for small and medium-sized…

name: SalesSift
long_description:
SalesSift (formerly known as LeadFinch) is an intelligent lead-sourcing platform.

Our machine learning algorithm recommends the best new companies to target based upon the profile of your existing customers.
one_liner: Intelligent Lead Sourcing

name: Hive
long_description:
Hive is the industry-best marketing platform for event marketers. Our platform powers marketing for 1500+ of the most iconic event, festivals,  venues, promoters, and event-centric brands across North America.

We help our clients sell out their shows and make their events unforgettable - by helping them grow their customer base and personalizing and automating their email, SMS, and ad campaigns.

Hive integrates with 25+ partners like Ticketmaster and Shopify, ingesting rich customer data in real-time. With this data, event marketers can segment their audiences in powerful ways and send timely, customized messages to their customers.
one_liner: Marketing automation for event promoters (email, sms, ads, CRM)

name: PocketSuite
long_description: PocketSuite is a YC-backed mobile platform for service businesses, ranging from fitness trainers, photographers, and home cleaners to dog trainers, hairstylists, therapists, and life coaches. Businesses use PocketSuite to get booked, paid, and message their clients. We make the work of running your own business simple for solo operators and small teams. PocketSuite empowers the U.S. market of 20 million service professionals generating $800 billion in sales with a mobile cloud solution for running their business. Thousands of businesses run on PocketSuite. Over 500,000 clients book and pay their Pros on PocketSuite today and we're growing fast.
one_liner: PocketSuite makes it easy for your clients to book and pay you

name: OneLocal
long_description: OneLocal's cloud-based tools help you provide best-in-class experiences, connecting you with customers in a more meaningful way. Each tool is designed to work independently, but when connected together, they offer full-automation to drive revenue growth & save you time. There's no infrastructure or setup time required, simply login & watch OneLocal work for your business.
one_liner: OneLocal is a CRM for local businesses.

name: ZeroStorefront
long_description: We connect applications to drive more orders and better customer experiences for restaurants. The typical restaurant now uses more than two dozen different applications to run their business. Specifically, we connect, warehouse and route the data to improve analytics, marketing, operations and finance.  Our customers include brands like Frank Pepe’s, Halal Guys, Wings Over and more.
one_liner: #1 Data platform for restaurants. Acquired by Thanx

name: Exly
long_description: Exly is an all-in-one business platform built for knowledge businesses, coaches, trainers and creators to launch, manage and market their products (courses, webinars, ecommunities, 1:1 consultations and workshops).
one_liner: One stop shop for creators to launch, manage & grow their knowledge…

name: Dex
long_description:
Dex is a personal CRM that reminds you to keep in touch with the people you would otherwise forget.

Dex helps turn your acquaintances into your allies.  Going beyond the superficiality of social networks requires commitment.  If you remember to keep in touch thoughtfully, you can turn the interesting person you met at a networking event into a friend that has your back.  

I built Dex after failing to keep up with the tools I tried (Airtable, Notion, etc) for relationship management. Installing an actual CRM like Hubspot felt like a wrong fit for my informal relationships -- these people were 'my team,' not customers.

Dex is a lightweight personal CRM that’s easy to stick with. Key to Dex is a Chrome extension that enables you to manage relationships while you’re in Facebook, Messenger, Twitter, and the social apps you already use. Dex can also send you actionable reminders (daily, or based on your calendar events) to log your interactions for next time. By using Dex, you can:

- Build stronger relationships, by sending you a nudge to follow-up.
- Be more thoughtful, by helping you remember where you left off.
- Become a superconnector, by making connections you wouldn’t otherwise remember.
one_liner: Dex is a personal CRM that reminds you to keep in touch with the…

name: Prompt
one_liner: Helping busy professionals understand and maintain their relationships

name: Laylo
long_description: Laylo powers drops for the world’s biggest musicians and events. The platform combines landing pages, messaging, link tracking, and more to drive sales and streams around the most important moments in entertainment.
one_liner: The CRM powering iconic musicians and events

name: Crew
long_description:
Crew is the next-gen ATS/CRM built just for recruiting agencies and independent recruiters. 

It’s all about modern sourcing, packed with cool automation and even a dash of AI. It's beautiful and well-designed. Plus, it’s deeply integrated with LinkedIn—because let’s be honest, that’s where we recruiters hang out most of the day. With Crew, you can forget about all that tedious copying/pasting, and tab-switching, making your workday a whole lot smoother.
one_liner: Next Gen ATS/CRM for Modern Recruitment Agencies

name: Vessel
long_description:
Vessel is the developer-first, native integration platform for GTM tools. We make it easy for developers to integrate with your customer’s CRMs, Sales Engagement, Marketing Automation, Chat, Dialers, and more. Integrate in different ways customized for your use cases: 

- Speed: Use our Unified APIs to roll out many integrations quickly through a common data model and unified interface.
- Depth: Use our actions API to build deeper integrations when working with entities custom to each app.
- Ease: Use ETL to let us handle pulling and pushing customer data to your DB
- Extensible: Support any integrations through our open-source integrations library

Breadth and depth, make your integrations limitless.
one_liner: Developer-first, native integration platform for GTM tools

name: Relate
long_description: Relate is a modern Sales and Marketing CRM platform for B2B companies.
one_liner: All-in-One Sales and Marketing CRM for B2B teams

name: Struct
long_description: Struct is the platform for multi-lingual AI voice agents for any phone-based task. Our agents are already live doing tens of thousands of calls daily across the globe and in multiple languages.
one_liner: Multi-lingual AI Voice Agents

name: Twenty
long_description: Building a modern alternative to Salesforce: https://github.com/twentyhq/twenty
one_liner: Open Source CRM

name: Obento Health
long_description: Obento Health is redefining the CRM experience for medical field sales. Designed specifically for healthcare, we are saving reps time from documentation and empowering reps to create more personalized interactions with their customers.
one_liner: CRM Co-Pilot for Medtech Sales

name: DryMerge
long_description:
We create AI agents that constantly monitor emails, calendar, calls, or wherever else companies have relationship data and organize it into CRM records as meticulously as a great rep would.

We build these agents on top of the DryMerge platform, a tool to build AI agents that integrate with business apps and work in the background.
one_liner: AI that updates your CRM for you

name: Aether
long_description: Aether is a building measurement platform for home-services contractors and insurance carriers, delivering roof, exterior, interior, and property measurement reports.
one_liner: Aether turns imagery and video into building measurements.

name: Dench.com
long_description:
An AI Workforce paired with an in-built CRM, that lives in your communication channels, is online forever, knows your everything about your business. and does the tasks on your behalf only so you can click "Approve" every morning.

Build you own AI employees today...
- Lead intake via Voice / SMS / Email and then updating the Contact / Matter / Case in the CRM.
- Connects with Gmail / Outlook for AI to write replies (in draft for you to review) all ready to send, for every email that deserves your reply, so you don't spend time writing emails anymore.
- Handles outbound sales completely, scrapes all the leads there possibly are on the internet, phone books, data brokers, and contacts customers, chats back and forth with them at scale, infinitely, parallely all at once.
- Writes daily/weekly/monthly briefings and reports based on all the new context there is on the CRM every day/week/month. It finds out insights you possibly couldn't have found by looking at it all manually.
- Customer Research AI agents: find powerful POCs of a company, check through your LinkedIn connection tree to find out how far apart in mutual connections you are from them, research their background, and send out intro texts / emails / call agents to connect you with the POC.

and so much more. Contact us for enterprise needs.
one_liner: AI Workforce that does it all

name: Vantel
long_description: AI-native OS for the commercial insurance brokerages.
one_liner: AI Platform for Commercial Insurance Brokerages

name: PARES AI
long_description:
PARES is the single platform commercial real estate brokers need for their entire workflow, from chasing leads to closing deals and everything in between. 

With our platform, brokers can:

1) Automatically update real-time transaction data in our CRM

2) Create lists of target properties, skip-trace, and easily navigate outbound calls

3) Underwrite deals with our AI Underwriting Agent

4) Create OMs/BOVs in minutes with our AI Marketing Agent

Check us out at https://www.pares.ai/
one_liner: Helping commercial real estate brokers find and close more deals.

name: Ressl AI
long_description:
Ressl AI is building AI Agents to disrupt IT Services.

Enterprise applications like Salesforce are highly flexible and configurable, allowing them to adapt to the unique processes of different businesses. But implementing and maintaining Salesforce requires specialised Salesforce admins or outsourced consulting firms—both of which are expensive and slow.

At Ressl AI, we’re building 10× AI Salesforce Admins. Our agents let IT and RevOps teams configure Salesforce in plain English, accelerating Salesforce delivery by 10× without adding headcount.

Our agents can:

> Document your Salesforce org
> Find root causes of support issues
> Perform analysis and dependency mapping
> Configure flows and automations
> Write Apex code and test classes
> Upgrade orgs from legacy versions

Before building Ressl, Arushi and Abhishek ran an IT consulting firm for six months, using those learnings to productise RevOps and Salesforce consulting.

The global IT outsourcing market is projected to reach ~$600B in 2025. Ressl AI is excited to define what an agentic Accenture looks like.
one_liner: AI Agents for ERP / CRM Configuration, starting with Salesforce
